title: Can't loggin, client says my username / password is incorrect.

replies.body: Same here, I am able to log into the website but not able to login to the client.
I thought I was hacked for a second. almost started crying, lol.
I relate to you so fucking much on that.
They're fixing it now. Check the yellow exclamation mark on the site next to your name.
Same problem here, for both of my accounts.  Neither password is working. But was able to login to the site obviously. Whats the problem riot??
Conspiracy by Riot to force us to watch MSI after TSM Loss *Cue Twilight Zone Music*
TSM throwing that match had me tilted as well
same, but I can log on/off the boards just fine
me either :(
Its a bug there fixing it {{champion:103}}
they're*

WTF RITO?! Ranked is disabled
for how long???
until today's MSI is over, which already is
i can't log in either {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
same here, cannot login, the acct infor is correct.

I've had this problem for weeks. All you have to do is type your password normally, try to login, and if it says it doesn't work then delete and retype the first letter (or number) of your password. Tell me if that works for you guys.

> [{quoted}](name=draecina,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JGnOrPcA,comment-id=0079,timestamp=2017-05-15T13:08:36.914+0000)
>
> I've had this problem for weeks. All you have to do is type your password normally, try to login, and if it says it doesn't work then delete and retype the first letter (or number) of your password. Tell me if that works for you guys.

Thanks, this worked for me
It seems to be fixed now I was able to log in.
ranked?!?!?!?!
I can log in fine. :)))))))))
I can logg in now
Able to log in, but Ranked seems to be disabled. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

but why not ranked games?
:(
Im finaly able to login, but ranked is disabled -_-
Same
Love that this happens when I'm trying to procrastinate on studying!!!!!!!!!{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
this is so tru lmao
how long it will take  :'(
{{item:2050}} We're watching the response time. How long it takes for Rito to respond. {{summoner:14}}

They posted two minutes ago that they're working on a fix
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na

Hopefully this will be resolved soon, really wanted to play a little {{champion:30}} today
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
me too thanks
RITO PLEASE{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Jesus im glad I wasnt the only one, I thought I had been hacked but even the recover username/password options are just tanking and not working anyway. Please lets get this sorted out!
Im having the same problem.
Same issue, me and a friend are having issues with the client saying our passwords are wrong. Only the client is not working, website login and password changing options are working fine.
i'm getting the same thing
I'm also having this problem even though my username and password work to log into the website. Anybody know what's wrong?
Yep i can`t log in too . Can i have some suport 2 ?
check the Region / language :)
this has just started happening to my account what do i do???
Me either, happened 5mins ago
Ayyy again. Had to relog in a game, wont rejoin.

Me too..
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I have that problem now, said incorrect username or password, i know both are right. I changed password and still don´t work with new one....
Had to change my password because I thought my account was hijacked. I swear I pressed each key carefully for my password to make sure I was typing my password wrong.
gotta love this new client.  they should've kept the old one until this client was ready.  ranked matches just dropping every one getting disconnected.  wtf
It would be a lot slower with the old client consuming their resources doe.
